Package controller.BaseControllers

Class MainAppController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseControllers.Controller
controller.BaseControllers.MainAppController
Direct Known Subclasses:
HelpMenuController, HomeLocationController, MainMenuController, MapController, ProfileController, SpecificStoreController, StoreController, WeekPlanController, WithCrossController
public class MainAppController extends Controller
Class controlling all the methods on the FXML view of the side bar
